summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Phase 1 critical bug fixes. Backend performing excellently at 80% success rate with auth endpoints now working properly. 3 out of 4 critical frontend issues have been successfully resolved. However, TradingChart component still has critical error preventing Trade page functionality.

flaky_endpoints.note: Non-critical as other auth functions work properly

configuration_issues.issue: CORS headers not found in OPTIONS requests
configuration_issues.impact: May affect browser preflight requests in some scenarios
configuration_issues.note: Functionality works correctly, may be handled by proxy/ingress

critical_bugs.issue: chart.addAreaSeries is not a function - lightweight-charts v5 API error
critical_bugs.error_details: Despite code showing correct v5 API usage, runtime error persists. Trade page completely broken.
critical_bugs.console_error: TypeError: chart.addAreaSeries is not a function

passed_tests: Backend health check returns healthy status (200 OK)
GET /api/crypto returns live cryptocurrency prices with proper data structure
GET /api/crypto/bitcoin returns detailed Bitcoin information
POST /api/auth/signup creates new users successfully with verification modal
Authentication endpoints properly secured with 401 responses when not authenticated
GET /api/alerts endpoint correctly requires authentication
GET /api/admin/stats endpoint correctly requires authentication
POST /api/wallet/deposit/create endpoint correctly requires authentication
GET /api/wallet/balance endpoint correctly requires authentication
GET /api/transactions endpoint correctly requires authentication
GET /api/portfolio endpoint correctly requires authentication
GET /api/orders endpoint correctly requires authentication
Homepage loads with professional design and navigation
Auth page signup functionality works with verification code modal
Protected routes (Dashboard) correctly redirect to auth when not logged in
Dashboard loading timeout protection working (no infinite loading)
Users icon import fixed in Dashboard component
Auth context session check timeout (10 seconds) functioning properly
Rate limiter issues resolved - no more 500 errors on auth endpoints
Email verification modal displays properly after successful signup

success_percentage.backend: 80% - Significant improvement, auth endpoints working, minor issues remain
success_percentage.frontend: 75% - Major improvements in auth and protected routes, but TradingChart still broken

action_item_for_main_agent: CRITICAL: TradingChart component still broken with 'chart.addAreaSeries is not a function' error. The lightweight-charts v5 API fix appears incomplete or there may be a version/import issue. This prevents the core Trade page from functioning. Need to investigate: 1) Actual lightweight-charts version being loaded, 2) Import statement correctness, 3) Chart object creation, 4) Possible build/bundling issues.
